casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donald A. MILLER. No. 430P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 9, 2008. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, G. Dewey Hudson, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th day of September *5692008 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of October 2008."
